API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID. Get this value from https://youtu.be/5eEsvLAKVc0!

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API HASH. Get this value from https://youtu.be/5eEsvLAKVc0!

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token, as a string. https://youtu.be/cB4UduCcNWs

SESSION_NAME.description: Name you want to call your bot's session, Eg: bot username.

AUTH_USERS.description: Authorised user(s) id separated by space.

MAX_PROCESSES_PER_USER.description: Number of parallel processes each user can have, defaults to 2.

MAX_TRIM_DURATION.description: Maximum allowed seconds for trimming. Defaults to 600.

TRACK_CHANNEL.description: User activity tracking channel's id. Only needed if you want to track and block any user. Disabled by default.

SLOW_SPEED_DELAY.description: Delay required between each request. Defaults to 5s.

TIMEOUT.description: Maximum time alloted to each process in seconds, after which process will be cancelled. Defaults to 1800s(30 mins)

DEBUG.description: Set some value to use DEBUG logging level. INFO by default

WORKER_COUNT.description: Maximum number of processes should bot handle at a time to control overload on bot default value is 20.
